import React, {useEffect, useState} from 'react'; import {Avatar, IconButton} from '@material-ui/core'; import FormControl from "@mui/material/FormControl"; import FormLabel from "@mui/material/FormLabel"; import Select from "@mui/material/Select"; import MenuItem from "@mui/material/MenuItem"; import InputLabel from "@mui/material/InputLabel"; import './Pages.scss'; function Profile() { useEffect(() => { getUserInfo(); }) const getUserInfo =()=>{ const userInfo = localStorage.getItem('userInfo'); const user = JSON.parse(userInfo); console.log(user.data) setUser(user?.data.results.user); } // const user = getUserInfo(); const userDetails = { wallet_type : "BitCoin", wallet_address : "", financial_profesional : false, phone_2: "", state_of_residence: "", current_password: "", new_password: "", }; const [user, setUser] = useState(''); const [userProfile, setUserProfile] = useState(userDetails); const { phone_2, wallet_type, wallet_address, current_password, new_password } = userProfile; const handleInputChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setUserProfile({ ...userProfile, [name]: value }); }; return (

Manage Profile

(All fields marked with asterisks are required)
